original: 5.3.2. Atītavāra🔽Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānittha so samudayasaccaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: atītavāra  yaḥ dukkha saccam parijānittha saḥ samudaya saccam pajahittha ati āmantā
translated: … The Section on the Past🔽“Has anyone who fully understood the truth of suffering also abandoned the truth of origination?” They replied, “Yes.”

“Has anyone who has not fully understood the truth of suffering also not abandoned the truth of origination?” They replied, “Yes.”🔽“Has anyone who has fully understood the truth of suffering also abandoned the truth of origination?” They replied, “Yes.”

original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānittha so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahitthāti? Āmantā.🔽Yo vā pana …pe… ? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam na parijānittha saḥ samudaya saccam na ppajahittha ati āmantā 🔽yaḥ vā pana pe
translated: “Has anyone who has not fully understood the truth of suffering also not abandoned the truth of origination?” They replied, “Yes.”
